taskDescription: Tesla is building a 10 million square-foot “Gigafactory” in Nevada. While Tesla didn’t rely on systems selling in building the manufacturing facility, the company did contract with many suppliers, such as Anning-Johnson, to provide vital elements such as decking. For Tesla, this was a new task situation. List the various phases Tesla went through to arrive at the construction and operation of this lithium-ion battery Gigafactory.
